title: cho gath nerfed :'(
body: very unnecessary tbh if anything his ap scaling should be nerfed a little but ult cd and that 50% off reallllly come on

replies.body: WHAT!? When did they Nerf Cho'Gath! NOOO
it just makes Jungle Cho'Gath better, which I think is riot's focus in season 5. Increasing the champion pool for junglers
